hcictools 1.2.0
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    add_scores()
    This functions adds the score of a given item set and a key set using the psych package
    add_survey_response_duration()
    Add a survey response duration to surveymonkey data-frames. Dataframes must contain a date_created and date_modified column.
    auto_score()
    This function automatically scores a set of items and creates a scale variable. It detects inverse coding using the psych::alpha function.
    careless_indices()
    Detect careless responses
    copy_labels()
    Copy labels from one data set to another
    cor.matrix.plot()
    Plots a correlation matrix plot.
    draw.palette()
    draw.palette
    generate_codebook()
    Generate a Code-Book from a surveymonkey data-frame
    get.delta.range()
    get.delta.range
    get_emm_plot()
    Get ggplot object from jmv::ANOVA
    load_surveymonkey_csv()
    Loads surveymonkey generated csv files that contain 2 line headers
    mean_se()
    mean.se
    merge_type()
    merge.type
    name_variables()
    Rename all variables by a character vector, but keep unnamed variables the same
    numbers_only()
    Tests if a vector of strings can be a numeric
    plot(<CI>)
    plot.CI Plots two independent sample CI
    plot_IS_meansCI()
    plot.IS.meansCI
    prepare.data()
    prepare.data
    read_codebook()
    Read a codebook file for a surveymonkey dataframe
    rgb2hex()
    converts rgb values to hex notation
    rwth.colorpalette()
    rwth.colorplette
